document_data.mainbody:
The Day of All Sighs was a holy day observed by worshipers of Eshowdow, the Shadow Giant within the Chultan pantheon.
The Day of All Sighs was observed 66 days following the Unearthing, the date of which was not the same from year to year. The Eshowe would mourn the ancient defeat of Eshowdow by Ubtao and his tabaxi. The Eshowe renewed their desire for vengeance on the Dall of All Sighs. Shadow bindings were commonly performed on this day.
